mapdata.label: delft_simple_reachability
mapdata.info: Create data for Delft and define four region center levels.

attribute_info.label: Define folder where data will be saved.
attribute_info.max_travel_time_edge_sec: Enrich the original graph with nodes to make sure edges are of a maximum size.
attribute_info.speed_km_h: Used to create waiting time matrix and create regional centers.

reachability_info.ilp_time_limit_min: Max. time spent optimizing Gurobi ILP model to create regional centers.
reachability_info.max_neighbors: Dictionary of 'max_neighbors' neighbors surrounding each node.
reachability_info.step_list: List of delays to define regional centers.
reachability_info.round_trip: Region center are defined considering round trips.
